{{cpp/title|fgetpos}}
{{cpp/io/c/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=cstdio|
int fgetpos( std::FILE* stream, std::fpos_t* pos );
}}

Obtains the file position indicator and the current parse state (if any) for the file stream {{tt|stream}} and stores them in the object pointed to by {{tt|pos}}. The value stored is only meaningful as the input to {{lc|std::fsetpos}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|stream|file stream to examine}}
{{par|pos|pointer to a {{c|fpos_t}} object to store the file position indicator to}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|0}} upon success, nonzero value otherwise. Also sets {{lc|errno}} on failure.
